name: Director Marcus Ashton
core_wound: His grandfather was a Gamma who underwent illegal genetic modification to 'pass' as Alpha - Marcus's entire life is built on a secret that would destroy him
wants: To maintain the caste system at all costs, to protect his secret
needs: To accept his heritage and dismantle the system he's defending
voice_markers: Never raises his voice, more dangerous when quiet
Says 'for the good of the station' before ordering cruelty
contradiction: Enforces genetic purity while secretly being 'impure', believes in the system while knowing it's a lie
physical_description: White man, distinguished gray hair, expensive suits, thin and cold, hands that shake slightly when stressed (genetic instability from his grandfather's modification), carries himself with rigid control
flaws: Paranoia about his secret being discovered
Self-hatred projected as hatred of Gammas
Unable to show weakness or compassion
knowledge_state_book1_start: All station security and surveillance systems
How to erase people and information

relationships.Elara Quinn: His best investigator, sees her as protégé, furious when she betrays him
relationships.Jax Varro: Sees as embodiment of everything he fears about himself
relationships.Alpha Council: Reports to them, desperate for their approval to prove he belongs
relationships.His grandfather's memory: Haunted by it, both grateful and ashamed
